Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This unique item is not just a product; it's an experience tailored to elevate your life or business to new heights. Given its exceptional quality and versatility, I believe its true value exceeds $10000. Considering the unparalleled benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $15000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider it carefully. If you have any questions or need more information, please let me know. I look forward to potentially working with you on this exciting journey. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
